website_summaries.verdict: An impressive looking unit that is constructed from stainless steel and is large enough to cook up to 24 burgers at one time.
pros: This model has a number of features that are usually found on pricier units, which makes it a rather versatile grill
The large cooking surface along with the adjustable charcoal height and flue allow the user a high degree of temperature control
cons: The grill is not as durable as it appears
Be careful as some of the parts may break more easily than expected

customer_reviews.title: Not so much super duty
customer_reviews.text: Took 1 hr to assemble. Side was bent .More like super light duty. Dont get it. I wonder if engineers know that fire happens inside? Material quality is a joke. Flimsy and thin. One of the nuts used to mount the box broke at the twist when tightining. Grates are too far apart and thin. Hot dog will fall thru. The whole box is out of square. Stainless steel was scratched in several places. Charcoal basket is too far apart waisting half of the bricket. I dont see this grill lasting more then 3 seasons of moderate use
customer_reviews.author: Zlaninomma

customer_reviews.title: Good features, bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: So the grill has a charcoal access door, adjustable charcoal tray, and two shelves, which are all big plusses. Stainless steel looks nice. The grill rack is heavy duty and easy to clean. Build quality is really bad tough... Putting it together was a pain as some screw holes didn't match the holes on other pieces. The lip latches are stamped on crooked, so it closes crooked. Lid has bad gaps which let out smoke and heat. Overall do not recommend. At this price point I was expecting much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill and magnificent. It is nice and heavy and the design is impeccable. I will update my review once we have cooked on it. The lady who put it together said it’s a great grill and nice quality. She assembles them for a living.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. JAS

customer_reviews.title: Paint peels off while grilling
customer_reviews.text: Dyna-Glo DGN486SNC-D Heavy Duty Grill was working as a grill should until the paint started peeling off while I was grilling. You would think the manufacturer would use heat resistant paint on a grill. Other than that issue, it's a good grill. It traps heat in good and is easy to control the temperature while grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great good looking  grill.  Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The charcoal grill arrived on time in good condition. A lots of parts. I am not a handyman. So I initially thought it would be challenging for me to assemble. But the instruction was perfect. In fact I had fun putting it together. Looks beautiful. . Everything works as described. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Reza

customer_reviews.title: The features make this grill easy to use and adjust to cook your food as ...
customer_reviews.text: We used our grill for a large BBQ at our house and it was able to handle a large amount of food -- chicken, dogs, burgers, veggies. The features make this grill easy to use and adjust to cook your food as you like it. It's also very attractive on our patio. It was not difficult to assemble as long as you have 2 people to hold and turn it as you go. My husband and teen son were able to complete assembly in 1 hour 15 minutes without any trouble. I suggest covering it when not in use as we found some water in the bottom tray after a long rain.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lucy

customer_reviews.title: You put  together
customer_reviews.text: Took me 1 1/2 hours to put all the pieces together. If your not handy, you need someone to put together. Grill only raised about 3 inches. Would like it to to adjust at least 9 inches. Looks good. easy to clean out used charcol.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID FELL

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Small package problems, had a few dents and dings when opening .Although we decided to repair our selves ,the pit is pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: worth the extra
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made barbecue that has one (easily remedied) drawback. The grill only rises to within two and a half inches of the cooking grate. I like a quick sear as well as cooking off the remnants. I raised it using four three inch screws as pillars. It holds heat a surprizingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: el bigote

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Our grill was badly bent up when we took it from the box. There was no way to assemble it. We had to return it but we were reimbursed immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie W.

customer_reviews.title: My new Dyna-Glo arrived in bad conditions.
customer_reviews.text: New house, new grill, but when I opened the box of my new Dyna-Glo for the first weekend on my new place with the house full of friends, big deception, inside the box the main parts look beaten; actually, the pieces don't fit well, as you can see on the pictures. The worst part was that I couldn't check the box until that day. Please, try to be careful with your shipments guys, again, big deception.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Freytez

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Warning, very difficult to assemble together, took 5-6 hours. But in the end after finishing it, looks good and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Sye

customer_reviews.title: Still in the box on the porch, can't find ...
customer_reviews.text: Still in the box on the porch, can't find anyone to put it together. It is VERY heavy so I can't move it
customer_reviews.author: Stella Marie Van Ulzen

customer_reviews.title: temperature control
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the feature of being able to adjust the temperature by easily adjusting the height of the coals
customer_reviews.author: LAUREL ROBOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to assemble and the grills are easy to clean. I like the fact that there a 3 separate grills. Plus, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a good grill, but it must be more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Julio C. Pollarolo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father and he loves it! Also bought the cover for it
customer_reviews.author: TAMI LASSI

customer_reviews.title: East to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to assemble than other grills purchased. Durable. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk H.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill! Gave it as an Xmas gift. Used it weekly since. Well built. It will take more than one person to assemble though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: Someone along the route drop the box and dent one of the side other than that is ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not call it "Heavy Duty Stainless steel" at ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not call it "Heavy Duty Stainless steel" at all. the product is ok but it rusts really quick.
customer_reviews.author: GioG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Many parts to put together. The ease of all the levers and cranks are very easy to use. This is very heavy and sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Schwind

customer_reviews.title: otherwise a good grill
customer_reviews.text: of course.. some bolts did not fit as needed ..otherwise a good grill
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin R Marstin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After the 2nd use the black paint started to come off the grill and the cover
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moussa

customer_reviews.title: Wish it’s packed and protected well
customer_reviews.text: Pleased that it came out as pictured but was disappointed that the side panel was dented and to return is would cost to much.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ticsay

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill!!e rusted
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. It is sturdy, attractive,easy to clean, the ash tray makes cleaning it easy. I have only one suggestion. After a rain storm the ash tray filled with water. If I had not wanted to use the grill soon after the ran the tray would have rusted. I drilled a few holes in the tray to allow water to drip out . In order to keep the coals from droppint out I covered the tray with a metal piece of metal screening.I think this wouldbe a good addition for the manufacturer to consider adding.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how this cooks. No flame ups and easy to control the heat with the height adjustment and dampers. Much easier than with LP. Takes a while to assemble but not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I used only 5 times and the front of the grill is all brkwn..poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Coto

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking unit, but doesn't control heats very well. It's not very well sealed... the vents aren't that effective.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grill is far from heavy duty actually rather cheap do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: dj

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGN486SNC-D Heavy Duty Stainless Charcoal Grill, Large
product_meta.description: Cooking with charcoal is now stylish and functional with this stainless Dyna-Glo charcoal grill. Each cooking grate is made with porcelain enameled cast iron for maximum heat transfer and searing. Customize the cooking temperature by using the adjustment crank to raise and lower the charcoal tray. Reloading or stoking charcoal is made simple by opening the cast iron and steel access door on the front of the grill. The stainless smoke stack features an adjustable flue for additional temperature control. The lid and front firebox are double-walled to minimize heat loss and improve the burn efficiency of charcoal. The high capacity ash pan is removable for quick and easy clean-up.
feature_bullets: Charcoal tray adjustment system for fine-tuning heat control and cooking flexibility
3 Heavy-duty, hi-gloss porcelain enameled, cast-iron cooking grates retain heat for searing food and locking in natural juices
Heavy duty cart with side shelves, storage basket and 8-inch resin wheels for maneuverability
686 Total square Inch of cooking space provides plenty of room for all of your grilling needs; grill up to 24 hamburgers at one time
Stainless steel smoke stack with adjustable flue for heat control, stainless temperature gauge and heavy duty steel charcoal access door
Protect your grill with a custom-fit Dyna-Glo premium cover - Model DG576CC (Sold Separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
